sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button } from '../ButtonElements'; //import { Column2 } from './InfoElements'; import {InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2,TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle,BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img} from './InfoElements'; const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText,headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary, dark, dark2}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
